Class BlueAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.tomek_krzyszko.bluemanager.action.BlueAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotifyAction, ReadAction, WriteAction

    public abstract class BlueAction
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Abstract class which implements how all future action in library should look like and works.
